metadata.title: CVE-2017-18196 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Leptonica 1.74.4 constructs unintended pathnames (containing duplicatedpath components) when operating on files in /tmp subdirectories, whichmight allow local users to bypass intended file restrictions by leveragingaccess to a directory located deeper within the /tmp directory tree, asdemonstrated by /tmp/ANY/PATH/ANY/PATH/input.tif.

criterions.comment: leptonlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
